A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have no issues with the trajectory Rian Johnson sent the saga on\, I have a major problem of how it came togther in his movie.  I liked moments of this movie\, but as a movie\, it was a hot mess.  This wasn't about disappointing fanboys\, this was about failing to live up to the previous film and provide continuity\, as well as an inability to tell a story without using preachy dialogue to over explain why the story matters.
